title: Strengthening Hospitality Practical Competencies: Simulation-Based Educational Modules for Improving Pediatric Vaccination Rates

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational public health concepts and basic principles of vaccination
context.additional_context: Service/Customer Engagement Role-Specific Competency Development Program

learning_goals: Learners can explain the public health importance of pediatric vaccinations through VR simulation with over 80% accuracy
Learners can apply and evaluate vaccination rate improvement strategies at least three times in simulation environments using QI (Quality Improvement) coaching tools
Learners can demonstrate a process of revising and supplementing vaccination rate improvement plans biweekly by combining educational modules with data analysis tools
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
